attributes.title: do not reccomend!
attributes.review: this app is absolutely AWFUL! as soon as I opened it, it made fun of my dead grandma! how did it even know my grandma was dead?!?  it then proceeded to ask me what shoes she had on in her casket?! HOW AWFUL. TERIIBLE

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: The app is so terrible I got it and it would never let me open the app (constantly) and it got to a point when I did open it it GAVE ME A VIRUS I was so madddd this app is the worst app!!!!!

attributes.title: I almost died
attributes.review: This app worked my phone so much that it overheated and blew up! I had to go to the hospital and get a new phone, terrible app

attributes.title: There no games 😡😡😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking that there were games but there is not don’t waste your time with it. All it haves is politics and trump.😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Worst app everrre 😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: This app too way to long to download. After I got it open it was very very slow. And worse of all this app isn’t even that fun.😡😡😡

attributes.title: Really bad app
attributes.review: I couldn’t navigate through it I thought it would be better cause he was the president but it is not🤦🏾🤦🏾🤦🏾

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting and terrible
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible it’s the worst app on the planet it should be taken down and burned I don’t think this app should be legal

attributes.title: I wouldn’t suggest downloading
attributes.review: it took about A few hours to download just for crappy content.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app tracked me down and assaulted me don’t download this app download tik tok instead i hate this app you should too it tell fake news I hate it

attributes.title: this app is cursed !🍊
attributes.review: i had to wait three days for it to download and when it downloaded my phone started turning orange ! i was so scared ! all i wanted to do was help the orange god 🍊 but instead i got cursed 😔. i was deeply terrified so i had no other choice then to delete the app 😠. i do not recommend this app unless u like being haunted by oranges 😣
